All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AckReply
This class is used to send an ACK message to the client.
AdditionalPointsInfluenceCalculator
This calculator provides additional points to the given player in the influence calculation
App
 
AssistantCard
This card represents an assistant card used by players in the planning stage of the round
AssistantCardDeckView
This class shows a popup with the list of the available assistant cards
AssistantCardsView
This view shows a list of assistant cards playable by the user
AssistantCardView
This class shows an assistant card if present or the empty card.
AStudentsContainer
This class represents a generic students container which cannot be modified
BaseView
This is the base class for all the views.
BooleanInputView
This class represents the view for the boolean input.
CentaurCharacterCard
This class models the centaur card EFFECT: Towers are not considered in the influence calculation process
Character
This enum holds all the available character cards that can be randomly extracted
CharacterCard
This class is used to represent a generic character card
CharacterCardInformationPopup
This class represents the popup that shows the information of a character card.
CharacterCardsView
This view shows a list of character cards that the player can buy.
CharacterCardView
This class shows an assistant card if present or the empty card.
CLI
This class represents the CLI.
Client
This class is responsible for managing the client (both GUI and CLI)
Client.GameUpdateListener
Listener interface for game updates
ClientServerCommunicator
This class handles the low level communication from client to server
ClientServerCommunicator.CommunicatorListener
Listener interface
ClientServerCommunicator.ErrorListener
This listener is called when the request fails.
ClientServerCommunicator.SuccessListener
This listener is called when the request is successful.
CLIGameController
This class is responsible for controlling the game screen of the CLI.
CLIGameCreationMenuController
This class is responsible for controlling the game creation menu screen of the CLI.
CLIGameJoiningMenuController
This class is responsible for controlling the game joining menu of the CLI.
CLIMainMenuScreenController
This class is responsible for controlling the main menu screen of the CLI.
CLINavigationManager
This class manages the navigation for the CLI
CLIServerConnectionMenuController
This class is responsible for controlling the server connection menu of the CLI.
CLIWaitingRoomController
This class is responsible for controlling the waiting room screen of the CLI.
CloudsLayouts
This class contains the layouts of the clouds In other words, it contains the coordinates of the top-left cell of every cloud that needs to be drawn in CLI.
CloudsLayouts.Point
Used to represent the coordinates of a cell
CloudsLayoutView
This view is used to display all the clouds of the round
CloudsPane
This class shows the clouds of the game
CloudView
This view shows a cloud of students
CloudView
This class show a cloud with the given students
CommandInputView
This view shows an input view that listen for the specified commands.
CommandInputView.CommandListener
Listener called when a command is triggered
Constants
This class holds all the constants across the project
Constants.ThreePlayers
These constants are used in a game with 3 players
Constants.TwoPlayers
These constants are used in a game with 2 players (commented only once)
Controller
This is the main controller for the server.
CreateGameRequest
This class represents the request to create a game on the server with the specified parameters and automatically join it.
Cursor
This class represents the cursor of the CLI.
DashboardView
This view is used to show the dashboard of the game.
DefaultInfluenceCalculator
This class implements the default algorithm for influence calculation
DrawingCharacters
This class contains all the characters used to draw the CLI
DuplicatedNicknameException
 
FarmerCharacterCard
This class models the farmer card EFFECT: take control of the professor even if players have the same number of students for that color
Game
This class represents a game.
Game.GameUpdateListener
 
Game.State
this enum represents all the possible states of a game
GameController
This controller handles only one game.
GameController.GameUpdateListener
This interface models a listener for every Game update
GameJoiningError
 
GameListItem
 
GameListItemView
This class represents an item in the games list
GameRequest
This class represents a generic request regarding a specific game.
GamesListReply
This reply is sent by the server to the client in response to a ListGamesRequest.
GameTitlePopupView
This class is used to display win, lose, pause and other game states
GameTitlePopupView.State
Possible states of the title
GameUpdate
This class represents an update of the game.
GrandmaCharacterCard
This class models the grandma card EFFECT: put a no entry tile on the selected island
GUI
 
GUIGameController
This class is responsible for controlling the game screen.
GUIGameCreationMenuController
This class is responsible for controlling the game creation menu.
GUIGameJoiningMenuController
This class is responsible for the game joining menu.
GUIMainMenuController
This class is responsible for controlling the main menu screen.
GUINavigationManager
This class manages the navigation for the GUI
GUIServerConnectionMenuController
This class is responsible for controlling the server connection menu screen.
GUIWaitingRoomController
This class is responsible for controlling the waiting room screen.
HeraldCharacterCard
This class models the herald card EFFECT: Calculate influence on the selected island regardless of mother nature
InfluenceCalculator
Represents the common interface for all calculators used for calculating influence
InfluenceCharacterCard
This class is the supertype for all the character cards that affect influence calculation
InfoLabel
This label is used to show the current information of the game
InfoLabelView
This shows an info label (InfoString).
InfoString
This class contains all the information strings used by the client.
IntegerInputView
This view is used to ask user to input an integer value.
InvalidOperationException
A generic error used when an inconsistent state is reached in the project
Island
This class represents an island of the game.
IslandNotCompatibleException
 
IslandsCircularPane
This class shows the islands in a circular way, and manages various game states
IslandsLayouts
This class contains the layouts of the islands In other words, it contains the coordinates of the top-left cell of every island that needs to be drawn in CLI.
IslandsLayouts.Point
Used to represent the coordinates of a cell
IslandsLayoutView
This class shows all the islands of the game
IslandView
This view is used to show an island.
IslandView
This class shows an island
JoinGameRequest
This class represents the request to join the game with the specified uuid
KnightCharacterCard
This class models the knight card EFFECT: provides 2 additional points in influence calculation for the player that played the card
LeaveGameRequest
This class represents the request to leave the currently played game.
ListGamesRequest
This class represents the request to list the currently available games
ListView<T>
Generic list view for the CLI.
MinstrelCharacterCard
This class models the minstrel card EFFECT: swap 1 or 2 students between entrance and school for the player that played the card
MinstrelInputView
This input view is specific for the Minstrel card.
MotherNatureView
This class shows mother nature on every island
MotherNatureView.State
All possible states of mother nature
MoveMotherNatureRequest
This class represents the request to move mother nature in the currently played game.
MushroomManCharacterCard
This class models the mushroom man card EFFECT: ignore the selected student color during influence calculation
NackReply
This class is used to send a NACK message to the client.
NavigationManager
This interface is used to manage the navigation of the client (both GUI and CLI).
NicknameNotRegisteredError
 
NicknameNotValidException
 
NoColorInfluenceCalculator
This calculator ignores the selected student color in the influence calculation process
NoTowersInfluenceCalculator
This calculator ignores the towers in the influence calculator process
Palette
This class contains all the colors used in the CLI
PingRequest
This request is used to ping the server every @see Constants#PING_INTERVAL milliseconds.
PlaceStudentsRequest
This class represents the request to place students in school or on islands in the currently played game
PlayAssistantCardRequest
This class represents the request to play an assistant card in the currently played game
PlayCharacterCardRequest
This class represents the request to play a character card in the currently played game
Player
This class models a player of the game, storing all the information of the board
PlayerBoardView
This view shows a generic player board
PlayerBoardView
This class shows a player's board.
PostmanCharacterCard
This class models the postman card EFFECT: provides additional mother nature moves to the player that played the card
PrettyLogFormatter
This class is used by the logger to format the log messages.
ProfessorsControlInfluenceCalculator
This calculator lets the selected player take professor for a student color if the number of students is >= of other players (by default it is only >)
RandomizedStudentsContainer
This class is an AStudentsContainer but offers methods for picking random students from the container.
ReducedCentaurCharacterCard
 
ReducedCharacterCard
 
ReducedFarmerCharacterCard
 
ReducedGame
This record represents a game for the client.
ReducedGrandmaCharacterCard
 
ReducedHeraldCharacterCard
 
ReducedIsland
This record represents an Island for the client.
ReducedKnightCharacterCard
 
ReducedMinstrelCharacterCard
 
ReducedMushroomManCharacterCard
 
ReducedPlayer
This record represents a Player for the client.
ReducedPostmanCharacterCard
 
ReducedRound
This record represents a Round for the client.
RegisterNicknameRequest
This class represents the request to register a nickname on the connected server, this should be the first request sent to the server
Reply
This class represents a Reply, in other words a message from the server to the client associated to a specific request made by the client.
Request
This class represents a generic Request from the client to the server
Response
A Response is a message from server to client.
Round
 
Screen
This class represents all the possible screens of the game.
ScreenController
This class is implemented by every screen controller (both GUI and CLI).
SelectCloudRequest
This class represents the request to select a cloud in the currently played game
Server
This class binds to the socket at the given port and listens for connections
ServerClientCommunicator
This class handles the low level communication from server to client
ServerClientCommunicator.CommunicatorListener
Listener interface
ServerConfig
This record holds the server configuration.
SimpleInputView
This view is used to ask the user for a generic input.
Stage
This piece of code aims to implement a multilevel enum.
Stage.Attack
 
Stage.Plan
 
Student
This enum represents the student colors
StudentNotFoundException
 
StudentsBoardView
This class shows my students board
StudentsContainer
This class represents a students container that can be modified with methods like addStudent, removeStudent, addAll...
StudentsContainer.StudentNumberReachedListener
Listener for specific student and count
StudentSelectContextMenu
This class shows a context menu for the student selection
StudentsMaxReachedException
 
StudentView
This class shows a student (or professor) of the specified color
TitleView
This view is used to show a generic title with an optional subtitle.
TitleView.Title
All the possible titles
Tower
This enum represents the tower colors
TowerView
This class shows a tower with the given color
Update
Update is a message coming from server to client without a request associated.
Utils
This class offers several methods useful across the project
VirtualView
This class models a virtual view, this class communicates with the client (through a ServerClientCommunicator) and forward every Request to controller and the game controller.
